name: Police Chase Racing - Fast Car Cops Race Simulator
name_original: Police Chase Racing - Fast Car Cops Race Simulator
description:
GET READY for the police chase of your life as you drag race through the city against opponents in your nitro infused cop cars! Drive one of six amazing police vehicles inspired by REAL cop cars from around the world while leaving opponents in the dust!

FEATURES

- Single and multiplayer modes
- 6 different police racers to play and unlock
- Classic arcade style gameplay
- Sweet heart pounding soundtrack
- Awesome racing physics
- iPhone and iPad support
- Game Center Leaderboard

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback on a future update? We would love to hear from you! You can shoot us an email at support@yololabs.com.
